data.title: Junior and Senior Student Theses Record Group
data.text:
Collection Overview

This collection contains theses books and ledgers of graduating College students, 1900-1916. All theses are listed with author, thesis title, and date.

This collection contains materials related to enslavement. Proceed with care.
